$eref.description: An Azure action group.

___webhookReceivers.description: The list of webhook receivers that are part of this action group.

___smsReceivers.description: The list of SMS receivers that are part of this action group.

___azureFunctionReceivers.description: The list of AzureFunction receivers that are part of this action group.

___automationRunbookReceivers.description: The list of AutomationRunbook receivers that are part of this action group.

___enabled.description: Indicates whether this action group is enabled. If an action group is not enabled, then none of its receviers will receive communications.

___azureAppPushReceivers.description: The list of AzureAppPush receivers that are part of this action group.

___emailReceivers.description: The list of email receivers that are part of this action group.

___itsmReceivers.description: The list of itsm receivers that are part of this action group.

___voiceReceivers.description: The list of voice receivers that are part of this action group.

___logicAppReceivers.description: The list of LogicApp receivers that are part of this action group.

___groupShortName.description: The short name of the action group. This will be used in SMS messages.

$eref.description: Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.

_88AutomationRunbookReceiver.description: The Azure Automation Runbook notification receiver.

___webhookResourceId.description: The resource id for webhook linked to this runbook.

___useCommonAlertSchema.description: Indicates whether to use common alert schema.

___isGlobalRunbook.description: Indicates whether this instance is global runbook.

___automationAccountId.description: The Azure automation account Id which holds this runbook and authenticate to Azure resource.

___serviceUri.description: The URI where webhooks should be sent.

___name.description: The name of the logic app receiver. Names must be unique across all receivers within an action group.

___useCommonAlertSchema.description: Indicates whether to use common alert schema.

___callbackUrl.description: The callback url where http request sent to.

___resourceId.description: The azure resource id of the logic app receiver.

___useCommonAlertSchema.description: Indicates whether to use common alert schema.

___name.description: The name of the azure function receiver. Names must be unique across all receivers within an action group.

___functionAppResourceId.description: The azure resource id of the function app.

___httpTriggerUrl.description: The azure function http trigger url.

___name.description: The name of the email receiver. Names must be unique across all receivers within an action group.

___useCommonAlertSchema.description: Indicates whether to use common alert schema.

___emailAddress.description: The email address of this receiver.

___name.description: The name of the Itsm receiver. Names must be unique across all receivers within an action group.

___connectionId.description: Unique identification of ITSM connection among multiple defined in above workspace.

___ticketConfiguration.description: JSON blob for the configurations of the ITSM action. CreateMultipleWorkItems option will be part of this blob as well.

___region.description: Region in which workspace resides. Supported values:'centralindia','japaneast','southeastasia','australiasoutheast','uksouth','westcentralus','canadacentral','eastus','westeurope'
